1: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>and you</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Also thou son</n> אָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> הִנָּבֵ֖א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>prophesy</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָרֵ֣י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>unto the mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> הָרֵי֙ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>Ye mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> שִׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hear</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
2: כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> יַ֣עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> אָמַ֧ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>hath said</n> הָאוֹיֵ֛ב <sup>341 </sup> <n>Because the enemy</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הֶאָ֑ח <sup>1889 </sup> <n>against you Aha</n> וּבָמ֣וֹת <sup>1116 </sup> <n>high places</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>even the ancient</n> לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <sup>4181 </sup> <n>are ours in possession</n> הָ֥יְתָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have become</n> לָּֽנוּ׃
3: לָכֵן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>therefore</n> הִנָּבֵ֣א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>Therefore prophesy</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֔ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> כֹּ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> יַ֣עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>reason</n> בְּיַ֡עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>reason</n> שַׁמּוֹת֩ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>Because they have made [you] desolate</n> וְשָׁאֹ֨ף <sup>7602 </sup> <n>and swallowed you up</n> אֶתְכֶ֜ם <sup>853 </sup> מִסָּבִ֗יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>on every side</n> לִֽהְיוֹתְכֶ֤ם <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מֽוֹרָשָׁה֙ <sup>4181 </sup> <n>that ye might be a possession</n> לִשְׁאֵרִ֣ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>unto the residue</n> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> וַתֵּֽעֲל֛וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and ye are taken up</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> שְׂפַ֥ת <sup>8193 </sup> <n>in the lips</n> לָשׁ֖וֹן <sup>3956 </sup> <n>of talkers</n> וְדִבַּת־ <sup>1681 </sup> <n>and [are] an infamy</n> עָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n>
4: לָכֵן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> הָרֵ֣י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>Therefore ye mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> שִׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hear</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>of the Lord</n> יְהוִ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְ֠הוִה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> לֶהָרִ֨ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>to the mountains</n> וְלַגְּבָע֜וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and to the hills</n> לָאֲפִיקִ֣ים <sup>650 </sup> <n>to the rivers</n> וְלַגֵּאָי֗וֹת <sup>1516 </sup> <n>and to the valleys</n> וְלֶחֳרָב֤וֹת <sup>2723 </sup> <n>wastes</n> הַשֹּֽׁמְמוֹת֙ <sup>8076 </sup> <n>desolate</n> וְלֶעָרִ֣ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and to the cities</n> הַנֶּעֱזָב֔וֹת <sup>5800 </sup> <n>that are forsaken</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הָי֤וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have become</n> לְבַז֙ <sup>957 </sup> <n>which became a prey</n> וּלְלַ֔עַג <sup>3933 </sup> <n>and derision</n> לִשְׁאֵרִ֥ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>to the residue</n> הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <sup>5439 </sup> <n>that [are] round about</n> ס
5: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>therefore</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַר֮ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Therefore thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִה֒ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֠א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> בְּאֵ֨שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>Surely in the fire</n> קִנְאָתִ֥י <sup>7068 </sup> <n>of my jealousy</n> דִבַּ֛רְתִּי <sup>1696 </sup> <n>have I spoken</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>against the residue</n> הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and against</n> אֱד֣וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>and against all Idumea</n> כֻּלָּ֑א <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> נָתְנֽוּ־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which have appointed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצִ֣י ׀ <sup>776 </sup> <n>my land</n> לָ֠הֶם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>as</n> לְמ֨וֹרָשָׁ֜ה <sup>4181 </sup> <n>into their possession</n> בְּשִׂמְחַ֤ת <sup>8057 </sup> <n>with the joy</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> לֵבָב֙ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>of all [their] heart</n> בִּשְׁאָ֣ט <sup>7589 </sup> <n>with despiteful</n> נֶ֔פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>minds</n> לְמַ֥עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because of</n> מִגְרָשָׁ֖הּ <sup>4054 </sup> <n>to cast it out</n> לָבַֽז׃ <sup>957 </sup> <n>for a prey</n>
6: לָכֵ֕ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> הִנָּבֵ֖א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>Prophesy</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> אַדְמַ֣ת <sup>127 </sup> <n>therefore concerning the land</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> לֶהָרִ֣ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>unto the mountains</n> וְ֠לַגְּבָעוֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and to the hills</n> לָאֲפִיקִ֨ים <sup>650 </sup> <n>to the rivers</n> וְלַגֵּאָי֜וֹת <sup>1516 </sup> <n>and to the valleys</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> בְקִנְאָתִ֤י <sup>7068 </sup> <n>in my jealousy</n> וּבַחֲמָתִי֙ <sup>2534 </sup> <n>and in my fury</n> דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <sup>1696 </sup> <n>Behold I have spoken</n> יַ֛עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>because</n> כְּלִמַּ֥ת <sup>3639 </sup> <n>the shame</n> גּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> נְשָׂאתֶֽם׃ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>because ye have borne</n>
7: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Therefore thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נָשָׂ֣אתִי <sup>5375 </sup> <n>I have lifted up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָדִ֑י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>mine hand</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הַגּוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>Surely the heathen</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לָכֶ֣ם מִסָּבִ֔יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>that [are] about</n> הֵ֖מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>will themselves</n> כְּלִמָּתָ֥ם <sup>3639 </sup> <n>their shame</n> יִשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>you they shall bear</n>
8: וְאַתֶּ֞ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>O</n> הָרֵ֤י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>But ye O mountains</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עַנְפְּכֶ֣ם <sup>6057 </sup> <n>your branches</n> תִּתֵּ֔נוּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>ye shall shoot forth</n> וּפֶרְיְכֶ֥ם <sup>6529 </sup> <n>your fruit</n> תִּשְׂא֖וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and yield</n> לְעַמִּ֣י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>to my people</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קֵרְב֖וּ <sup>7126 </sup> <n>for they are at hand</n> לָבֽוֹא׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>to come</n>
9: כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִנְנִ֣י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וּפָנִ֣יתִי <sup>6437 </sup> <n>For behold I [am] for you and I will turn</n> אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> וְנֶעֱבַדְתֶּ֖ם <sup>5647 </sup> <n>unto you and ye shall be tilled</n> וְנִזְרַעְתֶּֽם׃ <sup>2232 </sup> <n>and sown</n>
10: וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֤י <sup>7235 </sup> <n>And I will multiply</n> עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>men</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>upon you all the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כֻּלֹּ֑ה <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> וְנֹֽשְׁבוּ֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>shall be inhabited</n> הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>[even] all of it and the cities</n> וְהֶחֳרָב֖וֹת <sup>2723 </sup> <n>and the wastes</n> תִּבָּנֶֽינָה׃ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>shall be builded</n>
11: וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֧י <sup>7235 </sup> <n>And I will multiply</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> אָדָ֥ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>upon you man</n> וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <sup>929 </sup> <n>and beast</n> וְרָב֣וּ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and they shall increase</n> וּפָר֑וּ <sup>6509 </sup> <n>and bring fruit</n> וְהוֹשַׁבְתִּ֨י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and I will settle</n> אֶתְכֶ֜ם <sup>853 </sup> כְּקַדְמֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>6927 </sup> <n>you after your old estates</n> וְהֵטִֽבֹתִי֙ <sup>2895 </sup> <n>and will do better</n> מֵרִאשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>7221 </sup> <n>[unto you] than at your beginnings</n> וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and ye shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n>
12: וְהוֹלַכְתִּי֩ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>along</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אָדָ֜ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>Yea I will cause men</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמִּ֤י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>upon you [even] my people</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וִֽירֵשׁ֔וּךָ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and they shall possess</n> וְהָיִ֥יתָ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>you will become</n> לָהֶ֖ם לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>thee and thou shalt be their inheritance</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תוֹסִ֥ף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>and thou shalt no more</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> לְשַׁכְּלָֽם׃ <sup>7921 </sup> <n>henceforth bereave</n> ס
13: כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> יַ֚עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> אֹמְרִ֣ים <sup>559 </sup> <n>Because they say</n> לָכֶ֔ם אֹכֶ֥לֶת <sup>398 </sup> <n>unto you Thou [land] devourest up</n> אָדָ֖ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>men</n> [אָתִּי כ] (אָ֑תְּ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> ק) וּמְשַׁכֶּ֥לֶת <sup>7921 </sup> <n>and hast bereaved</n> [גֹּויֵךְ כ] (גֹּויַ֖יִךְ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>Gentile</n> ק) הָיִֽית׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
14: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>therefore</n> אָדָם֙ <sup>120 </sup> <n>men</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> תֹ֣אכְלִי <sup>398 </sup> <n>Therefore thou shalt devour</n> ע֔וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> [וְגֹויֵךְ כ] (וְגֹויַ֖יִךְ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>Gentile</n> ק) לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and no</n> [תְכַשְּׁלִי־ כ] (תְשַׁכְּלִי־ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>bereave</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> ק) נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>any more saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n>
15: וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> אַשְׁמִ֨יעַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Neither will I cause [men] to hear</n> אֵלַ֤יִךְ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>anymore</n> כְּלִמַּ֣ת <sup>3639 </sup> <n>in thee the shame</n> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>the reproach</n> עַמִּ֖ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תִשְׂאִי־ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>any more neither shalt thou bear</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>any</n> [וְגֹויֵךְ כ] (וְגֹויַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>the nations</n> ק) לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תַכְשִׁ֣לִי <sup>3782 </sup> <n>to fall</n> ע֔וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>any more saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> ס
16: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>Moreover the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>came unto me saying</n>
17: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Son</n> אָדָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> בֵּ֤ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>when the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>dwelt</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>their own</n> אַדְמָתָ֔ם <sup>127 </sup> <n>in their own land</n> וַיְטַמְּא֣וּ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>they defiled</n> אוֹתָ֔הּ <sup>853 </sup> בְּדַרְכָּ֖ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>it by their own way</n> וּבַעֲלִֽילוֹתָ֑ם <sup>5949 </sup> <n>and by their doings</n> כְּטֻמְאַת֙ <sup>2932 </sup> <n>me as the uncleanness</n> הַנִּדָּ֔ה <sup>5079 </sup> <n>of a removed woman</n> הָיְתָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> דַרְכָּ֖ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>their way</n> לְפָנָֽי׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>was before</n>

34: וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> הַנְּשַׁמָּ֖ה <sup>8074 </sup> <n>And the desolate</n> תֵּֽעָבֵ֑ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>shall be tilled</n> תַּ֚חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>instead</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> הָיְתָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>of being</n> שְׁמָמָ֔ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>whereas it lay desolate</n> לְעֵינֵ֖י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of everyone</n> עוֹבֵֽר׃ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>of all that passed by</n>
35: וְאָמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they shall say</n> הָאָ֤רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> הַלֵּ֙זוּ֙ <sup>1977 </sup> <n>This</n> הַנְּשַׁמָּ֔ה <sup>8074 </sup> <n>that was desolate</n> הָיְתָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n> כְּגַן־ <sup>1588 </sup> <n>is become like the garden</n> עֵ֑דֶן <sup>5731 </sup> <n>of Eden</n> וְהֶעָרִ֧ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> הֶחֳרֵב֛וֹת <sup>2720 </sup> <n>and the waste</n> וְהַֽנְשַׁמּ֥וֹת <sup>8074 </sup> <n>and desolate</n> וְהַנֶּהֱרָס֖וֹת <sup>2040 </sup> <n>and ruined</n> בְּצוּר֥וֹת <sup>1219 </sup> <n>[are become] fenced</n> יָשָֽׁבוּ׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[and] are inhabited</n>
36: וְיָדְע֣וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>you shall know</n> הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>Then the heathen</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> יִֽשָּׁאֲרוּ֮ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>that are left</n> סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶם֒ <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> כִּ֣י ׀ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I the LORD</n> בָּנִ֙יתִי֙ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>build</n> הַנֶּ֣הֱרָס֔וֹת <sup>2040 </sup> <n>the ruined</n> נָטַ֖עְתִּי <sup>5193 </sup> <n>[places and] plant</n> הַנְּשַׁמָּ֑ה <sup>8074 </sup> <n>that that was desolate</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I the LORD</n> דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <sup>1696 </sup> <n>have spoken</n> וְעָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[it] and I will do</n> ס
37: כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> ע֗וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>also</n> זֹ֛את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> אִדָּרֵ֥שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>I will yet [for] this be enquired</n> לְבֵֽית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of by the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to do</n> לָהֶ֑ם אַרְבֶּ֥ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>[it] for them I will increase</n> אֹתָ֛ם <sup>853 </sup> כַּצֹּ֖אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>like a flock</n> אָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>them with men</n>
38: כְּצֹ֣אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>flock</n> קָֽדָשִׁ֗ים <sup>6944 </sup> <n>As the holy</n> כְּצֹ֤אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>as the flock</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n> בְּמ֣וֹעֲדֶ֔יהָ <sup>4150 </sup> <n>in her solemn feasts</n> כֵּ֤ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> תִּהְיֶ֙ינָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הֶעָרִ֣ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> הֶחֳרֵב֔וֹת <sup>2720 </sup> <n>so shall the waste</n> מְלֵא֖וֹת <sup>4392 </sup> <n>be filled</n> צֹ֣אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>with flocks</n> אָדָ֑ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n> וְיָדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and they shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> ס
